Plan ahead to introduce yourself to us by joining one of the information sessions listed below. These events for prospective LLM students typically feature a presentation, and a chance to learn about the NYU experience from recent graduates of our programs.   For all off-campus events, attendance is limited and advanced registration is required. To register, prospective students must submit an online form for the city they will attend, and receive confirmation from Graduate Admissions.
